name: "Rent" Mania - Act II Quiz | Musicals | 25 Questions

questions.text: How many minutes in a year?
questions.explanation:
525,600 minutes.

	You might know this without the "Rent" song "Seasons of Love". However it is mentioned in that song.

questions.text: Finish the line: "What does one wear that's apropos for a party, that's also a _________?"
questions.explanation:
crime.

	This song comes from "Happy New Year".

questions.text: Angel was once a Boy Scout, but what else was he?
questions.explanation:
Brownie.

	"Til some brat got scared."

questions.text: "What is Alexi Darling's cell phone number?
questions.explanation:
919-763-0090.

	Since her cell number actually included 919, I added 919 to all the other numbers as well. 460-4301 is her work phone, 563-6754 is her home phone. I made up the last number.

questions.text: What was Mimi wearing when she went to make Benny change his mind?
questions.explanation:
Black Leather and Lace.

	Benny says that she came to seduce him.

questions.text: When does the song "Take Me or Leave Me" take place?
questions.explanation:
Valentine's Day.

	Maureen explains to Joanne in this song that ever since puberty guys and girls have always found her attractive.

questions.text: In the song "Without You" Mimi and Roger list things that will continue to happen even without the other person. What is the first thing that Mimi mentions?
questions.explanation:
The ground thaws.

	Mimi does sing all these lines, but it's "The ground thaws" that she sings first.

questions.text: In the song "Without You" Mimi and Roger list things that will continue to happen even without the other person. What is the first thing that Roger mentions of the items listed?
questions.explanation:
The eyes gaze.

	Roger sings all of these lines, but his first one is "the eyes gaze". "The world revives" is the first thing out of his mouth, but it's not in the list of things.

questions.text: What does Alexi tell Mark to sell?
questions.explanation:
his soul.

	"Markie sell us your soul...just kidding."

questions.text: Complete this line "Mark Cohen, Alexi Darling, Labor Day weekend, in East Hampton, on the beach, just saw _____________.
questions.explanation:
Alec Baldwin.

	This was in "Voice Mail #4.

questions.text: In "Contact" who sang the line "You cannibal"?
questions.explanation:
Maureen.

	The last line of this song is song by Collins: "It's over."

questions.text: Who dies in the show?
questions.explanation:
Angel.

	All four have AIDS but only Angel dies during the actual show. Mimi almost does, but she sees Angel and she tells Mimi to go back.

questions.text: Complete the line from "Halloween": "Will it mean that it's the end and I'm __________."
questions.explanation:
alone.

	Mark sings this line, Mark fears being a failure and being alone.

questions.text: Why does Mark say he "detaches himself from feeling alive"?
questions.correct: I'm the only one of us to survive
options: I can't stand the thought of losing you
I'm too sexy for this life.
questions.explanation:
I'm the only one of us to survive.

	Roger is the one who sings about Mark detaching himself to which Mark replies "Maybe becuase I'm the only one of us to survive."

questions.text: Who does Roger say he sees everywhere
questions.explanation:
Mimi.

	Roger is in love with Mimi and it scares him because he knows she is going to die.

questions.text: "In voice mail #5 which mother speaks in Spanish?
questions.explanation:
Mimi's mother.

	All the other moms speak in English. The calls all overlap each other.

questions.text: Who sent a postcard that confused his or her mother?
questions.explanation:
Roger.

	"...moving to Santa Fe, back in NY now, starting a rock band."

questions.text: What is Muffy's real name?
questions.explanation:
Alison.

	Muffy is not well liked.

questions.text: What is the code that Collins used to break into an ATM machine?
questions.explanation:
ANGEL.

	He broke into the ATM at the Food Emporium.

questions.text: When Mimi is found, who says, "I can't get her up the stairs."?
questions.explanation:
Maureen.

	Maureen can't lift Mimi, and she's too weak to walk herself.

questions.text: Where has Mimi been living since she disappeared?
options: in a van down by the river
questions.explanation:
on the street.

	"cold...cold...would you light my candle."

questions.text: True or false: Mimi sang, "Don't waste your time on, Mimi, me me."
questions.explanation:
False.

	She sang "Don't waste your money on Mimi, me me."

questions.text: Roger finally found his song, what was it called?
questions.explanation:
Your Eyes.

	I still think his song was found long ago when he did "One Song Glory"

questions.text: When Roger sings "Your Eyes" who does the eyes refer to?
questions.explanation:
Mimi.

	Roger is in love with Mimi and he finally realizes it and is ready to stop running.

questions.text: What is the last line in "Finale B"?
questions.explanation:
No day but today.

	One of the best lines in the show: "No day but today." I hope you enjoyed the quiz.
